column4: i created a ext2 partition on my entire thumb drive  mkfs -t ext2 /dev/sdb. but now i want to create a vfat partition on the thumbdrive. unfortunately i cannot find /dev/sdb1. i cannot create vfat on /dev/sdb. any suggestions?
you'll need to partition the device into two first .. right now /dev/sdb is just one big partition.
use something like gparted, fdisk, etc
